remarks.para: May be inoperative provided Total Air Temperature (TAT) or Static Air Temperature (SAT) to (TAT) conversion is substituted as an indication of fuel temperature.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Substitute TAT as an indication of fuel temperature.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "FUEL TEMP IND INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
